column5: Hi everyone,  I'm going to be down around Niagara on the Lake area for a seminar and was hoping to see where the best places to have a chance of wetting the line for a couple of hours later today. I don't fish that area at all and would like a little help.  Please PM me any suggestions.  And if you're around there fishing please let me know so I can come by and say hello.  Thanks,  Stan
Oh by the way, it's fishing from shore.
